introduction: Sale and installation of metal shelves for stores and warehouses. Italian goods with high quality. Custom-made cash tables upon request.

password_reset_link_sent: Password reset link sent, if the email exists in our system.

error_occurred_try_again: An error occurred. Please try again.
min_length_phone: Phone number must be at least 8 digits
occupationNameHelper: Enter the name of the new occupation. This is a required field.
descriptionHelper: Enter a description for the new occupation. This field is optional.
parentOccupationHelper: Enter the name of the parent occupation. Leave this field empty if it doesn't have a parent occupation.
youCantModifyDealAfterSignedChangeToChat: You can't modify the deal after it's signed. Switching to chat mode.
suggestOne: Do you want to suggest an occupation for us?

theQuestionWillSend: the question will be sent to Gemini

name: Name

encouraging_services: Fill the form and request service now
confirmPostComment: Are you sure you want to post this comment?
getAISuggestionsBasedOnDescription: Get AI Suggestions Based on the Description
introDescription: This prompt will generate additional requirements based on the provided user description and worker offer.
listOfSuggestions: Please provide a detailed list of requirements based on the description to help in making a contract.
explanatoryMessage: Based on the provided user description and additional requirements, please suggest the necessary requirements for the worker.
possibleOccupations: Here are some possible occupations based on the user's description
chooseClosestOptionOrSuggest: Please choose the closest option. I do not want suggestions outside the list.
apiInstructions: This message is an API call to interpret by the user and should not suggest corrections.
include_in_deal: Include the new messages  into the deal
other_signed_contract: The other party has signed the contract. Please sign the contract to proceed.
signContractConfirm: Are you sure you want to sign the contract? Once signed, you cannot change the contract.
Are you sure you want to update your det: Are you sure you want to update your details?
confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to send a sign request?
confirmReject: Are you sure you want to reject this contract?
intro_to_ai: Below are the details of the current deal between the worker and the client. Please analyze the information and suggest additional requirements to improve the deal.
instruction_to_ai: Please analyze the above content and suggest additional requirements to improve the deal.
separator_explanation:
-------------------------
The above section contains the client's details and requirements. The following section contains the worker's details and requirements.
-------------------------
ai_dialog_description: This dialog helps you to request AI-generated suggestions to improve the deal based on the details provided.
confirmSubmitRating: Are you sure you want to submit the rating?
paymentPageDescription: Please enter a coupon code or proceed to payment to extend your subscription.
couponAppliedMessage: Coupon applied successfully! You get the service for free.
search_service_in_categories: Search for the needed service in these categories
upload_here_into_selected_category: Upload here into the selected category: {{categoryName}}
choose_from_suboccupation_list: You can choose from the suboccupation list
upload_your_request_and_we_will_match_it: Upload your request, and we will match it to the best occupation
search_page_description: Storage and shelving options for any weight and height
write_problem_description_and_we_suggest: Write your problem description and we will suggest what to choose from the occupations that we have
noMatchFound: No suitable match found. Please try again.
failedToParseAIResponse: Failed to parse AI response. Please try again.
genericError: An error occurred. Please try again.
requirementSuggestionDialogDescription: This dialog will suggest additional requirements based on the user description.
ai_detailed_intro: We are seeking your assistance to analyze the following information. This includes a detailed description of the client's needs, specific requirements they have listed, and the offers provided by various workers along with their comments. Your analysis should help determine the best offer and provide a rationale for this choice.
ai_analysis_instruction: Please analyze the detailed client description, specific requirements, and offers provided by various workers.
ai_best_offer_guidance_request: Provide guidance on how to choose the best offer and explain the reasoning behind your choice.
ai_help_dialog_description: This dialog will help you determine the best offer with the help of AI.
ai_help_dialog_title: AI Assistance for Choosing the Best Offer
closestOccupationOrNull: Please find the best and most appropriate occupation from the list for the given description. If you cannot find a close match, return only null.
onlyJsonResponse: Please find the closest occupation from the list. If you cannot find a close match, suggest one in the following JSON format without any additional text: { "name": "Suggested Occupation Name", "description": "Suggested Occupation Description" }
chooseImage: Choose an image for the occupation
aiDetectionNotice: The detection will be based only on the description. Images and videos will not help.
